xmp_schema.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM_description=The XMP Media Management Schema is primarily for use by digital asset management (DAM) systems.
xmp_schema.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM_label=Media Management

xmp_property.name: DerivedFrom
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/DerivedFrom_description=A reference to the original document from which this one is derived. It is a minimal reference; missing components can be assumed to be unchanged. For example, a new version might only need to specify the instance ID and version number of the previous version, or a rendition might only need to specify the instance ID and rendition class of the original.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/DerivedFrom_label=Derived From

xmp_property.name: DocumentID
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/DocumentID_description=The common identifier for all versions and renditions of a document. It should be based on a UUID; see Document and Instance IDs below.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/DocumentID_label=Document ID

xmp_property.name: History
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/History_description=An ordered array of high-level user actions that resulted in this resource. It is intended to give human readers a general indication of the steps taken to make the changes from the previous version to this one. The list should be at an abstract level; it is not intended to be an exhaustive keystroke or other detailed history.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/History_label=History

xmp_property.name: InstanceID
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/InstanceID_description=An identifier for a specific incarnation of a document, updated each time a file is saved. It should be based on a UUID; see Document and Instance IDs below.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/InstanceID_label=Instance ID

xmp_property.name: OriginalDocumentID
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/OriginalDocumentID_description=The common identifier for the original resource from which the current resource is derived. It should be based on a UUID.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/OriginalDocumentID_label=Original Document ID

xmp_property.name: ManagedFrom
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/ManagedFrom_description=A reference to the document as it was prior to becoming managed. It is set when a managed document is introduced to an asset management system that does not currently own it. It may or may not include references to different management systems.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/ManagedFrom_label=Managed From

xmp_property.name: Manager
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/Manager_description=The name of the asset management system that manages this resource. Along with xmpMM: ManagerVariant, it tells applications which asset management system to contact concerning this document.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/Manager_label=Manager

xmp_property.name: ManageTo
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/ManageTo_description=A URI identifying the managed resource to the asset management system; the presence of this property is the formal indication that this resource is managed. The form and content of this URI is private to the asset management system.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/ManageTo_label=Manage To

xmp_property.name: ManageUI
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/ManageUI_description=A URI that can be used to access information about the managed resource through a web.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/ManageUI_label=Manage UI

xmp_property.name: ManagerVariant
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/ManagerVariant_description=Specifies a particular variant of the asset management system. The format of this property is private to the specific asset management system.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/ManagerVariant_label=Manager Variant

xmp_property.name: RenditionClass
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/RenditionClass_description=The rendition class name for this resource. This property should be absent or set to default for a document version that is not a derived rendition.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/RenditionClass_label=Rendition Class

xmp_property.name: RenditionParams
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/RenditionParams_description=Can be used to provide additional rendition parameters that are too complex or verbose to encode in xmpMM: RenditionClass.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/RenditionParams_label=Rendition Params

xmp_property.name: VersionID
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/VersionID_description=The document version identifier for this resource. Each version of a document gets a new identifier, usually simply by incrementing integers 1, 2, 3 . . . and so on. Media management systems can have other conventions or support branching which requires a more complex scheme.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/VersionID_label=Version ID

xmp_property.name: Versions
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/Versions_description=The version history associated with this resource. Entry 1 is the oldest known version for this document, entry last() is the most recent version. Typically, a media management system would fill in the version information in the metadata on check-in. It is not guaranteed that a complete history of versions from the first to this one will be present in the xmpMM:Versions property. Interior version information can be compressed or eliminated and the version history can be truncated at some point.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/Versions_label=Versions

xmp_property.name: RenditionOf
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/RenditionOf_description=Deprecated in favor of xmpMM:DerivedFrom. A reference to the document of which this is a rendition.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/RenditionOf_label=Rendition Of

xmp_property.name: SaveID
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/SaveID_description=Deprecated. Previously used only to support the xmpMM:LastURL property.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/SaveID_label=Save ID

xmp_type.name: renditionclass
xmp_type.description: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/renditionclass_description=The type of rendition, from a controlled vocabulary of standard names (an open default The master document; no additional tokens allowed. thumbnail A simplified or reduced preview of a version. Additional tokens can provide characteristics. The recommended order is: thumbnail:format:size:colorspace. For example: thumbnail:jpeg, thumbnail:16x16, thumbnail:gif:8x8:bw. screen Screen resolution or Web rendition. proof A review proof. draft A review rendition. low-res A low resolution, full size stand-in.
xmp_type.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/renditionclass_label=Rendition Class

xmp_choice.label: $$$/xmp/xmpMM/renditionclass/0=The master document; no additional tokens allowed.

$$$/xmp/xmpMM/renditionclass/1=A simplified or reduced preview of a version. Additional tokens can provide characteristics. The recommended order is: thumbnail:format:size:colorspace. For example: thumbnail:jpeg, thumbnail:16x16, thumbnail:gif:8x8:bw.

xmp_type.name: resourceevent
xmp_type.description: $$$/xmp/stEvt/resourceevent_description=A high level event that occured in the processing of this document.
xmp_type.label: $$$/xmp/stEvt/resourceevent_label=Resource Event

xmp_field.name: changed
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/stEvt/resourceevent/changed_description=A semicolon-delimited list of the parts of the resource that were changed since the previous event history.
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/stEvt/resourceevent/changed_label=Changed

xmp_field.name: instanceID
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/stEvt/resourceevent/instanceID_description=The instance ID of the modified resource.
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/stEvt/resourceevent/instanceID_label=Instance ID

xmp_field.name: softwareAgent
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/stEvt/resourceevent/softwareAgent_description=The software agent that performed the action.
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/stEvt/resourceevent/softwareAgent_label=Software Agent

xmp_field.name: when
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/stEvt/resourceevent/when_description=Optional timestamp of when the action occurred.
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/stEvt/resourceevent/when_label=When

xmp_type.name: resourceref
xmp_type.description: $$$/xmp/stRef/resourceref_description=A multiple part reference to a resource. Used to indicate prior versions, originals of renditions, originals for derived documents, and so on. The fields present in any specific reference depend on usage and on whether the referenced resource is managed. Except for instanceID, the fields are all properties from the referenced resource's xmpMM schema.
xmp_type.label: $$$/xmp/stRef/resourceref_label=Resource Reference

xmp_field.name: event
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/stVer/version/event_description=High level, formal description of what operation the user performed.
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/stVer/version/event_label=Event

xmp_field.name: modifyDate
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/stVer/version/modifyDate_description=The date on which this version was checked in.
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/stVer/version/modifyDate_label=Modify Date
